sentences.english: The first use of cemented fragmental rock filling in China was conducted atTongkeng tin mine operated by Dachang Mine Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 大廠銅坑錫礦在國內率先使用塊石砂漿膠結充填法。

sentences.english: The so-called "well-born" is to be famous maker of memory chips.
sentences.chinese: 所謂“出身名門”就是必須是名牌大廠的內存顆粒。

sentences.english: There are tea collectors who always look for vintage Pu-erh made by famous factory.
sentences.chinese: 收藏人士總是熱衷於尋找大廠製作的年份普洱。

sentences.english: Dachang Industrial Park is located in Xiadian township, the township has the characteristics of unity.
sentences.chinese: 大廠工業園區位於夏墊鎮區，具有鎮區合一的特點。

sentences.english: Even a small factory can do the job, not to mention such a big factory as ours.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的活連小廠都能做，更不用說我們這樣的大廠了。

sentences.english: Today, most people drive cars produced by large auto makers.
sentences.chinese: 時下，絕大多數民衆開的車都是由汽車大廠所生產的。

sentences.english: Chromatic aberration -----We all goods companies are regular products, Please be assured the purchase.
sentences.chinese: 本店所有商品均爲正規大廠出品，請放心購買。

sentences.english: The products of this small neighbourhood factory are as good as those turned out by some large state-run plants.
sentences.chinese: 這個街道小廠的產品質量不下於一些國營大廠。

sentences.english: Premium products from decent factories, tested and verified material, advanced technology.
sentences.chinese: 大廠產品，材料考究，工藝精良，技術先進。

sentences.english: That was the scene of the tragedy in Nanjing Dachang.
sentences.chinese: 這是發生在南京大廠的一幕悲劇。
